home.title: Artyom Bordulanyuk | Full-Stack Portfolio
home.description: Explore Davit's full-stack web development projects with React, Node.js, and more.

summary.intro: Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications.
summary.specialization: I specialize in both frontend and backend development using React, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, and have strong experience implementing CI/CD pipelines, load-balanced Docker infrastructures, and real-time features.

experience.list1: Building fault-tolerant backend systems using Nginx and Docker Swarm across multiple IP servers
experience.list2: Creating responsive UI with modern frontend frameworks (React, Material-UI, Ant Design)
experience.list3: Integrating payment systems (Stripe) and automating PDF invoice generation
experience.list4: Managing microservices architecture with Redis and RabbitMQ
experience.list5: Writing unit and integration tests with Jest and SuperTest

summary.focus: I focus on clean architecture, performance-driven development, and delivering solutions that grow with the business.

details: Built real-time dashboards using ReactJS, Redux, and Socket.io to monitor key metrics
Developed scalable backend architecture using Node.js, Docker, and Nginx with multi-instance deployment across different IPs
Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, including rollback strategies
Integrated Stripe payments and generated PDF receipts using Puppeteer and webhook flows
Wrote unit and integration tests (Jest, SuperTest) and increased test coverage by 40%
Enhanced frontend performance via asset optimization and lazy loading
Created a custom CRM system using Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and React
Developed reusable UI components with Ant Design and Bootstrap
Designed scalable REST APIs with data indexing and migration strategies
Maintained robust testing with Jest and SuperTest
Managed CI/CD deployment and Docker-based architecture
Developed internal admin panels using React, ExpressJS, and MongoDB
Implemented real-time modules using Socket.io
Built backend logic with Node.js and designed RESTful API endpoints
Refactored legacy frontend codebases using modern React patterns
Developed responsive interfaces with Material-UI, EJS, and SCSS
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and accessibility compliance
Collaborated closely with backend developers to integrate API data
Delivered HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React training in group sessions
Created learning projects and provided one-on-one support to junior developers

faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.philosophy: I believe in creating digital experiences that are not just functional, but meaningful. Every line of code should serve a purpose, every design decision should enhance the user's journey, and every project should leave a positive impact.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: I work primarily with React, Node.js, Python, and modern databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. I'm also experienced with cloud platforms like AWS and containerization with Docker. I stay current with emerging technologies and choose the best tools for each project's specific needs.

faqs.question: How do you approach new projects?
faqs.answer: I start by deeply understanding your business goals and user needs. Then I create a detailed technical plan, design wireframes, and build iteratively with regular feedback loops. Communication is key - I provide regular updates and involve you in key decisions throughout the development process.

faqs.question: What's your typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2–4 weeks, while a full-stack application could take 2–4 months. I always provide realistic estimates upfront and break projects into milestones so you can track progress and provide feedback along the way.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I offer various support packages including bug fixes, feature updates, performance monitoring, and technical consultation. I believe in building long-term relationships with my clients and helping their projects evolve as their business grows.

faqs.question: How do you ensure code quality?
faqs.answer: I follow industry best practices including comprehensive testing, code reviews, and documentation. I use modern development tools for linting, formatting, and continuous integration. Every project includes proper error handling, security measures, and performance optimization from the ground up.

faqs.question: Can you work with existing teams?
faqs.answer: Yes! I'm experienced in collaborating with existing development teams, designers, and stakeholders. I adapt to your current workflows, tools, and methodologies. Whether you need additional development capacity or specialized expertise, I integrate seamlessly into your team structure.
